language.entry: +%d%% chance to absorb debuffs when attacked
Damage Block tokens, also known as "Aegis tokens", absorb 100% of the physical damage from the next attack that strikes the hero.
The Invader and the undead deal heavy damage to Marked targets.
You have a greater chance to be invaded based on how many Order members you take on a quest.
Prepare for the Invader and stay vigilant!
{colour_start|sels_frenzy}Frenzy{colour_end} +25%% Damage / +3 Speed / No Dodge when under 50%% HP.
{colour_start|riposte}Parries{colour_end} heroes who are {colour_start|mark}Marked{colour_end}, dealing heavy damage.
Chance to apply {colour_start|mark}Mark{colour_end} and {colour_start|stun}Stun{colour_end} on {colour_start|riposte}Riposte{colour_end} hit.

赠予伤害免疫，又名“宙斯盾之令”，吸收下次被造成的伤害。
入侵者和不死者会对被标记目标造成严重伤害。
你在这次任务的成员人数多少会导致受到集团型入侵概率的提升。
为入侵者做好准备，保持警惕！
{colour_start|sels_frenzy}狂热{colour_end} +25%% 伤害 / +3 速度 / 无法闪避 当小于 50%% 生命.
{colour_start|riposte}招架{colour_end} 敌人时 {colour_start|mark}标记{colour_end}，造成严重伤害。
有概率造成 {colour_start|mark}标记{colour_end} 和 {colour_start|stun}晕眩{colour_end} 在 {colour_start|riposte}反击{colour_end} 攻击时。
